moves.1. e4 d5 2. exd5 Nf6 3. c4: My preffered line of the scandinavian
moves.3... c6 4. dxc6 Nxc6 5. d3: safest move in this line IMO
moves.5... Bf5: Better than the usual Bg4, Nd4 IMO, causes white real problems.
moves.9. Nh4:
Rather than the usual 0-0, Rd8, Ne1.

Not sure if it's sound or not. But thought it would buy me some time anyway
moves.9... Bxf2+: So much for buying me time!
moves.10. Kxf2 Qd4+ 11. Kg3: Alternative was Be3, Qxh4 , g3, Qh3. But thought I could hold the knight
moves.11... g6: Good move. Can't take the bishop.
moves.12. h3:
Creating an escape square for  the king, although I'm sure there's a better line here this is a simple line and  I was running low on time

White - 18 minutes
Black  - 20 minutes
moves.13. Nf3: Maybe there is a better move but nothing wrong with this
moves.13... Qd6 14. Bg5: A bad move, e4  and white is pegged back considerabely.
moves.14... Nh5+: the best move considering he missed e4
moves.15. Kf2: Can't play the planned Kh2 as e4  is then still playable
moves.15... Rd7: Think this is a bit slow. e4 is still strong IMO
moves.16... Re8 17. Be3: didn't like possibilies of Qg3  later on picking up the bishop
moves.17... e4: Should've been played earlier but still the right move IMO
moves.18... Qg3+: A clever line and the best for black
moves.19. Kg1 Bxe4 20. Qe1:
Have to do something about this kingside rampage

White - 9 minutes
Black  - 11 minutes
moves.20... Bxd5 21. Bf2: Intending to kick the queen away then take on d5. Alternative is cxd5, Rxe3, dxc6 which in hindsight is fine. I think Bxf3 is strong here for black. Picking up a hell of alot of material for the queen.
moves.21... Qf4: But not spotted in the time rush.
moves.22. cxd5 Rxd5 23. Rd1:
Planning to swap off into a winning endgame

White - 5 minutes
Black - 2 minutes
moves.23... Ra5: weak move in the time rush.
moves.24... Rxa2: Missing white's next move due to complete lack of thinking time!
